name: Re-Move It
description:
A game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 (My first game jam :) ) 

Can you move all blocks to their destination in the restricted number of moves? 25 short levels are waiting for you.

You can select the movement direction with WASD/ arrow keys and move the block with space (or stay at your current position). 

Have Fun!

Edit: It's currently only possible to play the game on a 1920x1080p-screen. I will fix that after the game jam (or make a WebGl-Version, as it was originally intended)!

Credits:

  • Music: La Native 8 Bit (Link)
  • Font: 3Dventure by memesbruh03 (Link)
  • Color Palette: Resurrect 64 Palette by Kerrie Lake (Link)

Used Tools:

  • Unity 2020.1.1f1
  • Gimp 2.10.8
  • Bfxr
  • BoscaCeoil
